attributes.description:
Motus TOYOTA Nelspruit offers nationwide delivery to all of our valued customers as well as our very
own Finance and Insurance Manager who is ready to help with finance at our dealership
or over the phone for your CONVENIENCE in a matter of MINUTES with all 4 major banks. All of our vehicles come
with a 160-point QUALITY Check meaning they check every part of the vehicle to make sure it is
101% Roadworthy as well as 101% PERFECT just for you! Please note that the price
advertised excludes our Documentation, License and Delivery fees all at one standard
price. Test Drives and Trade Ins are most certainly welcome

attributes.description: Finance Is Available With All The Major Banks As We Are Approved Dealers. Please Come And Visit Our Used Car Manager And Our Business Manager They Will Be Able To Arrange A Taylor Made Deal Structure To Match Your Pocket Over A Lovely Cup Of Coffee At Our Bistro. Trade-ins Welcome And We Pay Top Prices For Good Clean Vehicles. First Time To Finance Our Finance And Insurance Manager Will Assist You Step By Step Throughout Your Process. Should You Require Further Information Or You Would Like To Arrange A Test Drive Please Do Not Hesitate To Contact Us At Motus Toyota Strijdom Park.

attributes.description:
ONLY CASH AND EFT
TRADE INS ACCEPTED 
STRICTLY NO FINANCE

WE HAVE 3 BRANCHES FOR YOUR CONVENIENCE PLEASE CONTACT US TO CONFIRM LOCATION OF YOUR DESIRED VEHICLE!

 

MONDAY TO FRIDAY: 8AM TO 5PM
SATURDAY:8AM TO 1PM








































THIS IS AN AUTHENTIC AD WITH A REPUTABLE DEALER. PLEASE BE AWARE OF SCAMS WITH FRAUDSTERS USING OTHER ADVERTISERS PHOTO’S. DO NOT PAY OVER ANY DEPOSIT’S UNLESS YOU HAVE CONFIRMED THE VEHICLE EXISTS DUE TO EXTENSIVE FRAUD!!
attributes.title: 2004 Citroen C3 1.4 Pluriel

attributes.description: KIA PINETOWN we pride ourselves on delivering quality Pre- Owned vehicles, belonging to a multinational company who is South Africa's biggest motor group which owns 340 dealers country wide. All our vehicles have to pass a DEKRA Condition Report, DEKRA roadworthy certificate and an 125 point quality check at our workshop for your peace of mind motoring. We will tailor make a finance package that will suit your pocket. Kia Pinetown can offer extended warranties and service plans on all vehicles. Trade in's accepted and nationwide delivery can be arranged, call now, one of our Sales executives will gladly bring the vehicle out to you or welcome you with a warm cup of coffee at our dealership
